actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to help relieve the burden of high property taxes by allowing each homeowner a Federal income tax credit or rebate for property taxes paid for the support of public schools.

summary.text: Residential Property Tax Relief Act -- Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals a refundable income tax credit for State and local property taxes attributable to the support of public elementary and secondary education. Limits the credit taken to $150, plus in the case of taxpayers aged 62 or more the, amount by which such taxes exceed five percent of their income for the taxable year.

titles.title: A bill to help relieve the burden of high property taxes by allowing each homeowner a Federal income tax credit or rebate for property taxes paid for the support of public schools.
